name: chicagotribune
text: Many Chicagoans are scrambling to get their prescriptions filled after at least 60 pharmacies sustained damage or closed in recent days amid unrest over the death of George Floyd. The problem is particularly acute on the city's South Side. https://t.co/SlzWf7lTfx

name: chicagotribune
text: RT @chitribopinions: Can the Chicago Police Department carry out widespread cultural change in 90 days? No. The legacy of abuse is too deeply ingrained to wash away in three months. But Mayor Lightfoot is right when she says the pace of reform has been unacceptably slow. https://t.co/pmD6bBkl44
